title: Encore Magazine wants your 'Handmade Typography'.
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010144118/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 5.Apr.2006 8.28am 

\_\_\_  
Encore goes Designmai Youngsters  
**’Handmade Typography’ Contest**

\_\_\_  
Encore Magazine is searching for the finest typographic and completely handmade realization of the word “Encore”.

Different techniques are possible, e.g. painting, drawing, spraying, or tinkering. However, the use of modern technical equipment such as computers is not allowed.

The goal of the contest is to receive as many variations of the word “Encore” as possible.

The best works will be presented at an exhibition at the Designmai Festival in Berlin/Germany.  
For more informations and an example image provided by Eikes Grafischer Hort, check out [http://contest.encore-mag.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010144118/http:/contest.encore-mag.com/ "http://contest.encore-mag.com")

\_\_\_  
Contact:  
 [contest@encore-mag.com](mailto:contest@encore-mag.com)  
 [http://www.encore-mag.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010144118/http:/www.encore-mag.com/ "http://www.encore-mag.com")
author: Miss Tiffany
